    SRI KDU SDN BHD Vacancies ENGLISH TEACHERS (NATIONAL SECONDARY SCHOOL)

    December 1, 2020

    TOC

    • Job Description
    • Company Overview
    • How To Apply

    SRI KDU SDN BHD is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for ENGLISH TEACHERS (NATIONAL SECONDARY SCHOOL) position. If you currently looking for new education sector job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

    Job Description

    • Implementing the Academic programs and other efforts of the National Secondary School
    • Teach English lessons at the Lower or Upper Secondary School levels
    • Monitor the performance of students
    • Assist in implementing co-curriculur activities of the school
    • Advice parents on academic programs
    Requirements:
    • Bachelor's Degree in English or a related field 
    • At least 3 years or above of English teaching experience at the Lower or Upper Secondary School level 
    • Experience with preparing students for PT3/ SPM examination
    • Excellent management and organizational skills
    • Good Editorial work experience with good interpersonal and communication skills
    • Able to work independently
    • IT literate
    Interested applicants are invited to apply via online or write to:
    The Human Resource Department
    Sri KDU Sdn Bhd
    No. 3, 5 & 7, Jalan Teknologi 2/1,
    Kota Damansara
    47810 Petaling Jaya
    Selangor Darul Ehsan
    You may view our website at www.srikdu.edu.my for more information about our school.
    Only shortlisted applicants will be notified.
    All appointments are subject to an interview, identity checks, criminal record checks and successful references. 

    Company Overview

    Sri KDU® Schools are premier private and international co-educational institutions offering the Malaysian Curriculum (Primary 1 to Secondary 5), the UK National Curriculum (Year 1 to 11) and the International Baccalaureate Diploma Programme.
    Vision
    To become the most successful, most trusted and most innovative K-12 education group in South East Asia
    Mission
    Transforming lives through education
    At Sri KDU Schools we recognise the importance of having a child protection policy to establish procedures and practices for the wellbeing of the children and to reinforce our commitment to create a caring and safe learning environment for all of our students.

    How To Apply

    If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
    Hope you find your dream education sector job in Selangor.
    Apply Online
